name: Ned: Iron Outlaw
summary: Ned is a doom-like 2D metroidvania platformer, based on Ned Kelly – Australia’s most infamous outlaw. Run and gun through endless swarms of enemies, wielding standard shooters alongside some truly original (and crazy) weapons; explore a twisted take on true events starring real life Aussie legends; And decide the fate of the tangled bush, with playing style determining Ned’s choice between folk-legend or corrupted beast.
